metadata.name: Great Guardian
metadata.description: Golem, also known as "The Protector of Treasures" is well known fantasy story that has been part of kids bedtime stories. Yet not much people know, in ancient glyph it has been written that Golem is an organism born from earth essence to maintain nature life in this world.  This day people call it fantasy/legend, but ancient hieroglyphics said "the time will come, for the Great Guardian to make everything back in balance"
